sections.heading: 01|County buildings, offices, equipment
sections.text: Effective:April 7, 2009Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 353 - 127th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) A courthouse, jail, public comfort station, offices for county officers, and a county home shall be provided by the board of county co

sections.heading: 19, inclusive, of the Revised Code, do not repeal or abrogate other sections of the Revised Code authorizing contracts or agreements among particular classes of subdivisions, or modify or impair the force of such sections in respect of contracts or agreements entered into under such sections
